monstros.descricao: Abominoms  are enemies in the Philips CD-i game The Faces of Evil.
Arwings are unused enemies in Ocarina of Time.

aparicoes.nome: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time

monstros.descricao: Arurodas are scorpion-like enemies in The Adventure of Link.

aparicoes.nome: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link

monstros.descricao: Baby Dodongos are enemies in Ocarina of Time.

monstros.descricao: Arrow Traps are recurring traps in The Legend of Zelda series.

monstros.descricao: Babusu are shadow beings in A Link to the Past. They appear in the Ice Palace.

aparicoes.nome: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past

monstros.descricao: Baba Serpents are enemies in Twilight Princess.

aparicoes.nome: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess

monstros.descricao: The Armos Warrior is the Sub-Boss of Skull Dungeon in Oracle of Ages..

aparicoes.nome: The Legend of Zelda: Oracle of Ages

monstros.descricao: Arrgi are recurring Enemies in The Legend of Zelda series. Arrgi go unnamed in Ancient Stone Tablets.

aparicoes.nome: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past
The Legend of Zelda: A Link Between Worlds

monstros.descricao: Arpagos are recurring flying dragon-like enemies in The Legend of Zelda series.
